text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 28.1. Tuaa-Seen-Meem 28.2. Yeh aayaten hain roshan kitab ki 28.3. Hum aap kay samney musa aur firaon ka sahih waqiya biyan kertay hain unn logon kay liye jo eman rakhtay hain 28.4. Yaqeenan firaon ney zamin mein sirkashi ker rakhi thi aur wahan kay logon ko giroh giroh bana rakha tha aur unn mein say aik firqay ko kamzor ker rakha tha aur unn kay larkon ko to zibah ker dalta tha aur unn ki larkiyon ko zinda chor deta tha. Be-shak-o-shuba woh tha hi mufisdon mein say
